PrecisAuthority (a) to enter into a SETTLEMENT AGREEMENT with the SIKSIKA NATION for the purpose of resolving a specific claim associated with the surrender in 1910 of part of Blackfoot Indian Reserve No. 146 in Alberta, and (b) to accept the absolute surrender set out in the schedule to the Agreement.
